event.title: Chris is declared a winner
event.description:
Seminar is designed to bring community and academia together to eliminate health disparities. The goal of the conference will be to discuss reasons for asthma disease disparities and explore solutions with community leaders. At the end of this workshop, the participant will be able to: summarize asthma health disparities; identify community, workplace, and health professional challenges in promoting asthma health equality; understand community-based approaches to preventing and responding to asthma health disparities; explain ethics and public policy issues in addressing asthma disease disparities. Continuing Education Credits: Continuing education credits are being offered: http://healthsciences.creighton.edu/addressing-health-disparities-focus-asthma
Registration: Please Register By Monday, April 21, 2014 online at http://2014asthma.eventbrite.com
